MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-DEC-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Shieldhall, affecting properties in Mavisbank Avenue and surrounding areas. Following a recent power cut, It has been necessary for our engineers to isolate further supplies at 2:00pm to carry out a permanent repair to our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35pm on Thursday, 31 December 2020
